rich-page.field:
Dashboard

## Reported By #set($infoText = "Reported by $transaction.users().getBy().id($securityService.getCurrentUser()).render()<br/>$date.long") #if($widgetContext.target().isEditor()) <div style="color: grey; text-align: left;">$infoText<div> #elseif($widgetContext.target().isPdf()) <div style="color: grey; text-align: right; position: absolute; top: 22px; right: 10px;">$infoText<div> #elseif($widgetContext.target().isPrint()) <div style="text-align: right; position: absolute; top: 35px; right: 10px;">$infoText<div> #end

Project Epics

WorkItem epic luceneVelocity Draft draft priority true Accepted accepted priority true In Progress inprogress priority true Done done priority true Resolved verified rejected priority true assignee severity priority epicEstimate targetVersion status resolution childStoryPoints initialEstimate remainingEstimate timeSpent linkedWorkItems 50 true ## This is an example on how to customize the appearance of the Kanban Board cards. It approximates the original Java rendering. ## Below are the styles used in the Card Script. <style> .kanbanWorkItemDiv { padding: 7px 3px 3px 7px; box-sizing: border-box; border-left: 5px solid; border-right: 1px solid #EEEEEE; border-top: 1px solid #EEEEEE; border-bottom: 1px solid #EEEEEE; border-radius: 5px; position: relative; } .kanbanWorkItemDivSmall { padding: 0px 3px 0px 3px; box-sizing: border-box; border-left: 5px solid; border-right: 1px solid #EEEEEE; border-top: 1px solid #EEEEEE; border-bottom: 1px solid #EEEEEE; border-radius: 5px; position: relative; } .kanbanWorkItemTitleDiv { height: 38px; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; font-size: 12px; color: #0E4A90; padding: 2px 4px 0px 2px; position: relative; line-height: 15px; word-break: break-all; word-wrap: break-word; border-collapse: separate; } .kanbanWorkItemTitleGradientDiv { bottom: 0px; height: 12px; left: 0; position: absolute; width: 100%; display: inline-block; background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0), white) repeat scroll 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr='#00FFFFFF', endColorstr='#FFFFFFFF', GradientType=0); } .polarion-sidebar-highlight .kanbanWorkItemTitleGradientDiv { background: none; } .kanbanWorkItemTable { border-spacing: 2px; width: 100%; table-layout: fixed; border-collapse: collapse; height: 38px; } .kanbanWorkItemStatusIcon { vertical-align: middle; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; word-break: break-all; word-wrap: break-word; width: 18px; } .kanbanWorkItemID { vertical-align: middle; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; word-break: break-all; word-wrap: break-word; width: 100%; } .kanbanWorkItemAssignee { vertical-align: middle; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; word-break: break-all; word-wrap: break-word; width: 38px; } .kanbanWorkItemAssigneeClosed { white-space: nowrap; text-align: right; padding-right: 4px; color: #A2A2A2; font-size: 11px; text-overflow: ellipsis; } .kanbanWorkItemAssigneeDiv { vertical-align: middle; width: 36px; height: 36px; overflow: hidden; position: relative; padding: 2px; } .kanbanWorkItemAssigneeImg { border: none; vertical-align: middle; width: 36px; height: 36px; float: right; border-radius: 18px; } .kanbanWorkItemAssigneeCountDiv { border-radius: 6px; line-height: 12px; font-size: 9px; text-align: center; top: 26px; left: 26px; height: 12px; width: 12px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-weight: bold; color: white; border: solid 1px white; background-color: grey; position: absolute; overflow: hidden; } .kanbanGreyText { color: #A2A2A2; } .kanbanStatusBarDiv { padding: 0px 2px 2px 4px; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: top; margin: auto; border-radius: 5px 5px 5px 5px; width: 80%; } .kanbanStatusBarTable { width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; height: 11px; } .kanbanStatusBarDone { background-color: #86C142; border-radius: 2px 0px 0px 2px; } .kanbanStatusBarProgress { background-color: #AED77E; } .kanbanStatusBarNotDone { background-color: #F1F1F1; border-radius: 0px 2px 2px 0px; } </style> ## This is an example on how to customize the content of Kanban Board cards. ## ## The following additional objects are also available when using velocity customization: ## $workItem - The Work Item rendered in the card. ## $columnIndex - The column that the card is rendered on. #set($wiId = $workItem.getReference().id()) #set($wiProjectId = $workItem.getReference().projectId()) #set($wiLink = $transaction.context().createPortalLink().project("$wiProjectId").workItem("$wiId").toEncodedRelativeUrl()) #set($wiType = "") #set($wiStatusColor = "white") #set($wiType = $workItem.fields().type().optionIdIfCan()) #if(!$wiType.equals("")) #set($wiStatusEnum = $transaction.enumerations().getEnumeration("status").forType("$wiType").forProject("$wiProjectId")) #set($wiStatus = $workItem.fields().status().optionId()) #set($wiStatusColor = $wiStatusEnum.byId("$wiStatus").fields().color().get()) #end #if(!$wiStatus.equals("verified") && !$wiStatus.equals("rejected")) #set($tableClass = "kanbanWorkItemDiv") #else #set($tableClass = "kanbanWorkItemDivSmall") #end <div class="$tableClass" style="border-left-color: $wiStatusColor;"> #if(!$wiStatus.equals("verified") && !$wiStatus.equals("rejected")) <div class="kanbanWorkItemTitleDiv"> <div class="kanbanWorkItemTitleGradientDiv"></div> <table style="width: 100%;"> <tr> <td> <a href="$wiLink" target="_top" title="$workItem.fields().title().render()">$workItem.fields().title().render()</a> </td> <td style="vertical-align: top;"> #set($treeLink = $transaction.context().createPortalLink().project("$wiProjectId").workItems().query("id:$wiId").toEncodedRelativeUrl()) #set($suffix = '&tree_depth=2&tab=tree') <a href="$treeLink$suffix" target="_blank"> <img style="float: right;" alt="View Item in a Tree Structure" title="View Item in a Tree Structure" src="/polarion/ria/images/details/treetable.gif"/> </a> </td> </tr> </table> </div> <table> <tbody> <tr> <td><span class="kanbanGreyText">Priority:</span> $workItem.fields().priority().render()</td> </tr> <tr> <td><span class="kanbanGreyText">Epic Estimate:</span> $workItem.fields().get("epicEstimate").render()</td> <tr> #if(!$wiStatus.equals("draft")) <tr> <td><span class="kanbanGreyText">Target Version:</span> $workItem.fields().get("targetVersion").render()</td> <tr> #end </tbody> </table> #end <table class="kanbanWorkItemTable"> <tbody> <tr> <td class="kanbanWorkItemStatusIcon"> $workItem.fields().status().render().withText(false) </td> <td class="kanbanWorkItemID"> $workItem.render().withLinks() </td> #if(!$renderingContext.target.isPdf) #if(!$wiStatus.equals("verified") && !$wiStatus.equals("rejected")) <td class="kanbanWorkItemAssignee" rowspan="2"> #set($wiAssignees = $workItem.fields().assignee()) #if(!$wiAssignees.isEmpty()) #set($assigneeNames = "") #foreach($assignee in $wiAssignees) #set($name = "") #set($name = $assignee.fields().name().getIfCan()) #if($name.isEmpty()) #set($name = $assignee.getReference().id()) #end #if($assigneeNames.isEmpty) #set($assigneeNames = $name) #else #set($assigneeNames = "$assigneeNames, $name") #end #end #set($firstAssigneeId = $wiAssignees.iterator().next().getReference().id()) #set($linkMaker = $transaction.users().getBy().id("$firstAssigneeId").fields().avatarFileName().link()) #set($assigneeAvatarUrl = $linkMaker.toEncodedRelativeUrl("$transaction.users().getBy().id('$firstAssigneeId').fields().avatarFileName().link()")) <div class="kanbanWorkItemAssigneeDiv"> <img title="$assigneeNames" src="$assigneeAvatarUrl" class="kanbanWorkItemAssigneeImg"> #if($wiAssignees.size() > 1) <div title="$assigneeNames" class="kanbanWorkItemAssigneeCountDiv">$wiAssignees.size()</div> #end </div> #end </td> #else #set($wiAssignees = $workItem.fields().assignee()) #set($width = $math.mul(20, $wiAssignees.size())) <td class="kanbanWorkItemAssigneeClosed" style="width: ${width}px"> #if(!$wiAssignees.isEmpty()) #foreach($assignee in $wiAssignees) <span title="$assignee.fields().name().getIfCan()">$assignee.fields().initials().render()</span> #end #end </td> #end #end </tr> #if(!$wiStatus.equals("verified") && !$wiStatus.equals("rejected")) <tr></tr> #end </tbody> </table> #if(!$wiStatus.equals("draft") && !$wiStatus.equals("verified") && !$wiStatus.equals("rejected")) ## Epic's Story Point Progress START #set($storyPointsTotal = 0) #set($storyPointsCompleted = 0) #set($storyPointsInProgress = 0) #set($unestimatedStoryCount = 0) #set($unestimatedStoryIDs = "") #set($linkedStoriesQuery = "project.id:$wiProjectId AND type:userstory AND linkedWorkItems:parent=$wiId") #set($linkedStories = $transaction.workItems().search().query("$linkedStoriesQuery")) #foreach($linkedStory in $linkedStories) #set($storyPoints = 0) #if(!$linkedStory.isUnresolvable() && !$linkedStory.fields().get("storyPoints").is().empty()) #set($storyPoints = $linkedStory.fields().get("storyPoints").get()) #set($storyPointsTotal = $math.add($storyPointsTotal, $storyPoints)) #if($linkedStory.fields().resolution().optionId().equals("done")) #set($storyPointsCompleted = $math.add($storyPointsCompleted, $storyPoints)) #else #set($linkedStoryStatus = $linkedStory.fields().status().optionId()) #if($linkedStoryStatus.equals("inprogress") || $linkedStoryStatus.equals("changesneeded") || $linkedStoryStatus.equals("implemented")) #set($storyPointsInProgress = $math.add($storyPointsInProgress, $storyPoints)) #end #end #else #set($unestimatedStoryCount = $math.add($unestimatedStoryCount, 1)) #set($unestimatedStoryIDs = "$unestimatedStoryIDs $linkedStory.getReference().id()") #end #end ## Render Story Point Progress #set($storyPointsToDo = $math.sub($math.sub($storyPointsTotal, $storyPointsCompleted), $storyPointsInProgress)) #set($done = $math.mul($math.div(100, $storyPointsTotal), $storyPointsCompleted)) #set($progress = $math.mul($math.div(100, $storyPointsTotal), $storyPointsInProgress)) #set($notDone = $math.sub($math.sub(100, $done), $progress)) ## Render Bar #if(($storyPointsTotal > 0 || $unestimatedStoryCount > 0)) <hr style="height: 1px; color: lightgray; background-color: lightgray; border: none;" /> <div class="kanbanStatusBarDiv"> #if($storyPointsTotal > 0) <table class="kanbanStatusBarTable"> <tbody> <tr> <td title="Completed: $storyPointsCompleted Story Points" class="kanbanStatusBarDone" style="width:$done%;"></td> <td title="In-Progress: $storyPointsInProgress Story Points" class="kanbanStatusBarProgress" style="width:$progress%;"></td> <td title="Not-Yet-Started: $storyPointsToDo Story Points" class="kanbanStatusBarNotDone" style="width:$notDone%;"></td> </tr> </tbody> </table> #end #if($unestimatedStoryCount > 0) #set($unestimatedItemsLink = $transaction.context().createPortalLink().project("$wiProjectId").workItems().query("id:($unestimatedStoryIDs)").toEncodedRelativeUrl()) <table class="kanbanStatusBarTable"> <tbody> <tr> <td colspan="3" style="line-height: 8px;"> <a href=$unestimatedItemsLink class="link" target="_top"> <span style="color: darkgray !important; font-size: 8px;"> #if($storyPointsTotal > 0)+#end$unestimatedStoryCount Unestimated#if($unestimatedStoryCount == 1) Story#else Stories#end </span> </a> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> #end </div> #end ## Render WI's Story Point Progress STOP #end </div>

## Current Release Info Title #set($projectId = $page.getReference().projectId()) #set($plansInProgress = $transaction.plans().search().query("project.id:$projectId AND status:inprogress AND template.id:release")) #if($plansInProgress.size() > 1) <h2>Current Release</h2> #elseif($plansInProgress.size() == 1) #set($plan = $plansInProgress.iterator().next()) <h2>Current Release - $plan.render().withLinks()</h2> #end
## Current Release Info #set($projectId = $page.getReference().projectId()) #set($plansInProgress = $transaction.plans().search().query("project.id:$projectId AND status:inprogress AND template.id:release")) #if($plansInProgress.size() > 1) $widgetContext.renderWarning("There are more than one Release <b>In Progress</b>.") #elseif($plansInProgress.size() == 1) #set($plan = $plansInProgress.iterator().next()) <div class="polarion-rp-widget-part" data-widget="com.polarion.planProgress"> <span class="polarion-rp-widget-parameters"> <sub id="plan"> <sub id="paths"> <sub>$plan.getReference().id()</sub> </sub> </sub> <sub id="showIdealProgress">true</sub> <sub id="showLabel">true</sub> <sub id="advanced"> <sub id="width"></sub> </sub> </span> </div> <div title: { text: '', useHTML:true }, exporting: { enabled: false }, credits: { href: null, text: null }, xAxis: { maxPadding: 0, type: 'datetime' }, yAxis: { title: { text: 'Story Points', useHTML:true }, gridLineWidth: 0 }, tooltip: { backgroundColor: 'rgba(247, 247, 247, 0.9)', formatter: function() { return '<i>This is sample content only</i><br/>' + '<small>' + Highcharts.dateFormat('%A, %b %e, ## Current Release Items by Status Chart #set($projectId = $page.getReference().projectId()) #set($plansInProgress = $transaction.plans().search().query("project.id:$projectId AND status:inprogress AND template.id:release")) #if($plansInProgress.size() == 1) #set($plan = $plansInProgress.iterator().next()) #if(!$plan.fields().allowedTypes().isEmpty()) #set($topLevelWiType = $plan.fields().allowedTypes().iterator().next().id()) <div class="polarion-rp-widget-part" data-widget="com.polarion.separateByPieChart"> <span class="polarion-rp-widget-parameters"> <sub id="title">Planned Items by Status</sub> <sub id="dataSet"> <sub id="prototype">WorkItem</sub> <sub id="subtype">$topLevelWiType</sub> <sub id="queryType">lucene</sub> <sub id="luceneQuery">PLAN:($plan.getReference().toPath())</sub> <sub id="children"> <sub id="separateBy"> <sub id="field">status</sub> </sub> </sub> </sub> <sub id="showDataLabels">true</sub> <sub id="showZeroValues">false</sub> <sub id="advanced"> <sub id="height">250px</sub> <sub id="width"></sub> </sub> </span> </div> #end #end
## Current Iteration Info Title #set($projectId = $page.getReference().projectId()) #set($plansInProgress = $transaction.plans().search().query("project.id:$projectId AND status:inprogress AND template.id:iteration")) #if($plansInProgress.size() > 1) <h2>Current Iteration</h2> #elseif($plansInProgress.size() == 1) #set($plan = $plansInProgress.iterator().next()) <h2>Current Iteration - $plan.render().withLinks()</h2> #end
## Current Iteration Info #set($projectId = $page.getReference().projectId()) #set($plansInProgress = $transaction.plans().search().query("project.id:$projectId AND status:inprogress AND template.id:iteration")) #if($plansInProgress.size() > 1) $widgetContext.renderWarning("There are more than one Iteration <b>In Progress</b>.") #elseif($plansInProgress.size() == 1) #set($plan = $plansInProgress.iterator().next()) <div class="polarion-rp-widget-part" data-widget="com.polarion.planProgress"> <span class="polarion-rp-widget-parameters"> <sub id="plan"> <sub id="paths"> <sub>$plan.getReference().id()</sub> </sub> </sub> <sub id="showIdealProgress">true</sub> <sub id="showLabel">true</sub> <sub id="advanced"> <sub id="width"></sub> </sub> </span> </div> <div class="polarion-rp-widget-part" data-widget="com.polarion.scriptedChart"> <span class="polarion-rp-widget-parameters"> <sub id="script"> <sub id="script">${esc.h}${esc.h} Iteration 3 { chart: {}, title: { text: '', useHTML: true }, exporting: { enabled: false }, credits: { href: null, text: null }, xAxis: { maxPadding: 0, type: 'datetime' }, yAxis: { title: { text: 'Story Points', useHTML:true }, gridLineWidth: 0 }, tooltip: { backgroundColor: 'rgba(247, 247, 247, 0.9)', formatter: function() { return '<i>This is sample content only</i><br/>' + '<small>' + Highcharts.dateFormat('%A, %b %e, %Y', this.x) + '</small><br/>' + this.series.name + ': <b>' + this.y + '</b>'; } }, series: [ { name: 'Ideal Work To Do', type: 'area', color: '${esc.h}1D9BD6', marker: { enabled: false }, dashStyle: 'ShortDot', fillColor: 'rgba(225, 240, 255, 0.5)', data: [ {x: Date.UTC(2017, 1, 1), y: 37.0}, {x: Date.UTC(2017, 1, 5), y: 25.0}, {x: Date.UTC(2017, 1, 10), y: 12.0}, {x: Date.UTC(2017, 1, 14), y: 0.0} ] }, { name: 'Work To Do', type: 'area', color: '${esc.h}53CCB1', marker: { radius: 5, lineWidth: 2, lineColor: 'white', fillColor: '${esc.h}53CCB1' }, fillOpacity: 0.3, data: [ {x: Date.UTC(2017, 1, 1), y: 37.0}, {x: Date.UTC(2017, 1, 6), y: 34.0}, {x: Date.UTC(2017, 1, 12), y: 31.0} ] }, { name: 'Relative Progress', type: 'column', color: '${esc.h}AED77E', marker: { enabled: false }, data: [ {x: Date.UTC(2017, 1, 1), y: 0.0}, {x: Date.UTC(2017, 1, 2), y: 0.0}, {x: Date.UTC(2017, 1, 3), y: 1.0}, {x: Date.UTC(2017, 1, 4), y: 2.0}, {x: Date.UTC(2017, 1, 5), y: 2.0}, {x: Date.UTC(2017, 1, 6), y: 1.0}, {x: Date.UTC(2017, 1, 7), y: 3.0}, {x: Date.UTC(2017, 1, 8), y: 3.0}, {x: Date.UTC(2017, 1, 9), y: 4.0}, {x: Date.UTC(2017, 1, 10), y: 5.0}, {x: Date.UTC(2017, 1, 11), y: 0.0}, {x: Date.UTC(2017, 1, 12), y: 4.0} ] } ] }; ## Current Iteration Items by Status Chart #set($projectId = $page.getReference().projectId()) #set($plansInProgress = $transaction.plans().search().query("project.id:$projectId AND status:inprogress AND template.id:iteration")) #if($plansInProgress.size() == 1) #set($plan = $plansInProgress.iterator().next()) #if(!$plan.fields().allowedTypes().isEmpty()) #set($topLevelWiType = $plan.fields().allowedTypes().iterator().next().id()) <div class="polarion-rp-widget-part" data-widget="com.polarion.separateByPieChart"> <span class="polarion-rp-widget-parameters"> <sub id="title">Planned Items by Status</sub> <sub id="dataSet"> <sub id="prototype">WorkItem</sub> <sub id="subtype">$topLevelWiType</sub> <sub id="queryType">lucene</sub> <sub id="luceneQuery">PLAN:($plan.getReference().toPath())</sub> <sub id="children"> <sub id="separateBy"> <sub id="field">status</sub> </sub> </sub> </sub> <sub id="showDataLabels">true</sub> <sub id="showZeroValues">false</sub> <sub id="advanced"> <sub id="height">250px</sub> <sub id="width"></sub> </sub> </span> </div> #end #end

Issue Activity (1 year)

WorkItem issue lucene created New Issues rgb(155, 89, 182) WorkItem issue lucene status:verified created New Verified Issues rgb(0, 128, 0) -365 0 month 31 250px
#info("Issues that are In Progress, Reopened or Done.")
Issues in Process WorkItem issue lucene status:(inprogress reopened done) Total Issues in Process rgb(163, 0, 0) -365 0 month 31 200px

Change Requests Activity (1 year)

WorkItem changerequest lucene created New Change Requests rgb(155, 89, 182) WorkItem changerequest lucene status:verified\-done created New Verified Change Requests rgb(0, 128, 0) -365 0 month 31 250px
#info("Change Requests that are either Reviewed or Approved.")
Change Requests in Process WorkItem changerequest lucene status:(reviewed approved) Total Change Requests in Process rgb(163, 0, 0) -365 0 month 31 200px

Project Activity (60 days)

#info("Daily trend of all created and updated Work Items.")
WorkItem lucene updated Updated Work Items orange WorkItem lucene created Created Work Items green -60 0 day 1 250px

Work Items by Type WorkItem lucene type true false 250px
